name: Shirahoshi
text: Activate: Main You may rest this character, then return 2 cards from your trash to the bottom of your deck in any order: If your opponent has 6 or more cards in their hand, your opponent discards 1.

effect.text: You may rest this character, then return 2 cards from your trash to the bottom of your deck in any order: If your opponent has 6 or more cards in their hand, your opponent discards 1.
